title: Women Mid Waisted Bootcut Jeans Zip Stretchy Slim Casual Double Button Flare Denim Pants with Distressed Pocket
description: Stretch Comfort: Our Slim Fit Bootcut Jeans incorporate a high stretch material, allowing maximum comfort and flexibility. Move freely and confidently in jeans that adapt to your pace.
TRUE TO SIZE: S=US(2-4), M=US(4-6), L=US(8-10), XL=US(12-14). Please refer to the seller's size chart for selection. Note that manual measurement error is approximately 0.4-1 inch.

Mid Rise Waist with Pocket: Set in a mid-rise style, these jeans sit comfortably on your waist for a perfect fit. The five-pocket design adds practicality, with back pockets featuring subtle distressing and contrast stitching. Blending function and fashion.
Secure Zipper Closure: The jeans come with a secure zipper closure, ensuring a snug and comfortable fit. Easy to use and reliable, it adds to the overall convenience of the jeans.

Sleek Slim Fit Design: Designed to accentuate your silhouette, our jeans hug your curves and gently flare into a trendy bootcut. The slim fit style gives a chic, streamlined look, perfect for day-to-day wear or dressier occasions.
Discover the perfect blend of style and comfort
with our Stretchy Slim Fit Bootcut Jeans for women. Crafted with high-quality stretchy material, these jeans offer flexibility and freedom of movement, ensuring ultimate comfort throughout your day.

The sleek slim fit design, coupled with a modern bootcut, accentuates your silhouette and adds a chic finish to any outfit. Our mid-rise denim pants are designed to sit just right on your waist, offering a comfortable fit that doesn’t compromise on style.
